attributes.action: Stop ITV from broadcasting England at major Tournaments
attributes.additional_details:
Comparing England football games televised:

BBC: 23 games Won: 14
ITV: 20 games Won: 6
BBC win ratio 60.86%
ITV win ratio 30%
attributes.background: Watching England on ITV has been such a disappointment since Euro 1996. I am fed up of the poor comentry/punditry on this channel. The evidence below shows that England games should only be shown on BBC
